The 🏏 between <team1> and <team2> was 🏆 by <winner> by <diff><withDL>.

IPLStarterText: Sure. I can help you with match information using the following parameters:
TeamPrompt: Do you want to know all matches of a single team or matches played between two teams?
NoMatch: There is no record of any match played on the queried data.
Error: Sorry I'm currently facing an technical error.
Fallback: Sorry I can't help you with query. Can you please try rephrasing it.
